description:
cmd/go: allow underscores in tool name
        Otherwise we can't invoke go_bootstrap directly.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a50b793f143b ***

cmd/go: allow underscores in tool name
        Otherwise we can't invoke go_bootstrap directly.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5900061
Okay, but why are you running go tool go_bootstrap?

On Mon, Mar 26, 2012 at 8:59 PM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Okay, but why are you running go tool go_bootstrap?
>
I'm debugging cmd/go, and suddenly I broke 'go install', so the only way to
get cmd/go back
is to use 'go tool go_bootstrap install cmd/go' if I don't want to want for
cmd/dist rebuilding
(nearly) everything.
I should have saved a backup of cmd/go.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

subject: code review 5900061: cmd/go: allow underscores in tool name
